subtitle: Computer Engineer at Duke University
about_me: Thanks for visiting my website! I'm a sophomore at Duke University studying Electrical/Computer Engineering and Computer Science, and I'm also interested in math, physics, and music. On this website, I share projects that I've completed/am working on as well as other thoughts. The site is powered by a custom-built static site generator/server written in Rust, featuring several different versions you can explore by clicking the "Change Theme" button. I hope you enjoy!
